name: iWorldHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on my living room light”
”Alexa, brighten my living room light”
”Alexa, set bedroom light to green.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The iWorld Home app is a complete smart home system that allows you to control a range of products including security cameras, smart bulbs, and smart plugs. Our easy to use app makes managing multiple devices easy and accessible from wherever you are. No need to download and manage multiple apps. This single app controls all iWorld Home devices.
Here’s a step-by-step guide:
1. Download our "iWorld Home" app in android or iOS App Store.
2. Launch the app and register a new account (or login if you’re already registered)
3. Turn on your iWorld Home device(s) and connect them with the “iWorld Home” App
4. IMPORTANT: You can rename the devices with the iWorld Home App. If you rename a smart bulb “Living Room Light,” Echo will retrieve that same name after discovering the devices in Step 8
5. Download Amazon "Alexa" App from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with the "Google Assistant" App
6. Search the "Alexa" app Skills directory for "iWorld Home"
7. Click Enable Skill, "iWorld Home", then input your account username, password and region on the linking page
8. Speak to Echo, “Alexa, discover devices.” Wait until Echo says, "Discover is completed."
9. Set up is complete. Now you can talk to Echo to control your devices.


Here are the iWorld Home voice commands:

Lights:
* Alexa, turn on my living room light
* Alexa, turn off my living room light
* Alexa, dim my living room light
* Alexa, brighten my living room light
* Alexa, set the living room light to 20 percent
* Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white.

Plugs:
* Alexa, turn on my plug
* Alexa, turn off my plug
